data.text:
Gongga West Slope, Ganzi, Sichuan, China. Nov, 2019.
#ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/zzEmCJC1IH

The key to success is self-confidence, and the key to self-confidence is to be ready at any time.
So, the new week starts, are you ready to fly with us? #ladypower https://t.co/QSrtX279JV

Want to learn more about Clear and Bright? #24solarterms 
Click here: https://t.co/kfmFjPYCKf https://t.co/cT5ABiOj7X

Today is Clear and Bright (Qingming). It is also a traditional Chinese festival, Tomb-Sweeping Day. The deepest tribute goes to the heroes who sacrificed their lives in the past 100 years for our peace, which allow us to have hope in sunshine and spring scenes. #24solarterms https://t.co/knoxGOzlre
Aligang Rinpoche, Tibet, China. May, 2019. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/1fvgq6No8U

Life is like a climb and there are times when you need to rest. 
It's Friday, time to relax! https://t.co/r0y4VjZhcn
RT @ChinaDaily: #GlamorChina A #fireworks show celebrated the completion of Chengdu Tianfu International Airport's terminal area. https://t…

data.text: Morning, guys. Need hot drinks to refresh yourselves before departure? CEAir has made rich coffee for you, why not stop by and take a try. #MUService https://t.co/7aeb1eHx3U
Tagong Grassland, Ganzi, Sichuan, China. Oct, 2020. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/B4ypNsqEHG
Aligang Rinpoche, Tibet, China. May, 2019. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/G3uBqwF3GP

It is a typical pastime for Hangzhou people to visit tea houses sipping tea from morning to afternoon. Hangzhou’s specialty Longjing tea has refreshing flavor to wipe away life stress. Come to Hangzhou, order a cup of tea and enjoy a idle life. #TravelwithCEAir @Hangzhou_CHINA https://t.co/zE8GqgVi8x

Wandering around Hangzhou’s traditional alleys in drizzling rain, nothing is more gratifying than holding a delicate oil-paper umbrella. As a traditional Chinese culture, the handicraft gives you a glimpse of both ancient and modern Hangzhou. #TravelwithCEAir @Hangzhou_CHINA https://t.co/ZUUyc9RdAA
Welcome this Monday with a new mood! Work hard and move forward to your goals! #ladypower https://t.co/ukgzU2xevh

data.text: As Chinese people say ”Heaven above, Hangzhou below”, Hangzhou is teeming with scenic, cultural and historical attractions. It’s time to visit West lake, a UNESCO world heritage site as basking in spring sunshine. Take a boat cruise and enjoy the southern city. @@Hangzhou_CHINA https://t.co/ndJ2GOrmFC

data.text: Two sides, flourish better. During the weekend, our maintenance engineer Miao Shuya plans to practice her calligraphy. How do you spend the weekend? #ladypower https://t.co/8bVGdL34HH

As March walks in, we are getting a taste of breezy warm spring. This time #TravelwithCEAir will bring you to a Chinesecity full of springtime bliss. Does the following hint give you any idea of which city it is? @Hangzhou_CHINA https://t.co/lsFy3Dsg3t

Attention, guys! CEAir has just launched brand new airline delicacy “花开富贵” (mean: happy life). The hand-made pastry package tastes tender. Got interested? Come and have a taste. #MUService https://t.co/YFOyF7XvOw

data.text: Taste of sea, beautiful view, lively folk activities. In Ningbo, you will not only feel the convenience of life brought by tech, but also experience the taste and customs that belong only here. Today, together with @TravelNingbo , have fun in this port city! #TravelwithCEAir https://t.co/6ieIwYjRp0

data.text: In Ningbo, there is a marriage custom called "Ten-mile Wedding procession". On the wedding day, dowries are fully prepared, the line to welcome the dowry could stretch for 10 miles. Now you have the chance to experience it by yourself. #TravelwithCEAir  @TravelNingbo https://t.co/3eua6ErIRr
The new week has begun! Together with our maintenance engineer Miao Shuya, cheer up and work hard! #ladypower https://t.co/mMdwZ8IxQs

data.text: CEAir is an active defender of beautiful environment . In the past 5 years, 2,000,000 tons of carbon emissions reduced, equaling 130,000,000 trees planted. This is the result of paperless tech & operating A350 series & B787 series. @Airbus @BoeingAirplanes #worldforestday https://t.co/Mc6WQPiGQ8

Want to learn more about Spring Equinox? #24solarterms 
Click here: https://t.co/2Q06tbrSWL https://t.co/8i0BSpSdrH

Today is one of the 24 solar terms, Spring Equinox. It signals the equal length of the day and night time. Through CEAir’s employment programme for poverty alleviation , more girls from underdeveloped mountainous area are given wings to fulfill their dreams and fly to the sky. https://t.co/QoDvabNgDR
RT @InsightNingbo: The air cargo volume at #Ningbo Lishe International Airport reached 2,932.2 tons in the first two months of 2021, a year…
It's Friday again! After a week’s work,  it’s time to relax! Let's spend the weekend with our flight attendant Deng Yuxue. #ladypower https://t.co/jrgC4CmQ6M

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: On March 17, CEA transported China-made vaccines from Beijing to Santo Domingo. It is China’s first intercontinental all-cargo charter flight for COVID-19 vaccines. The delivery was received by Dominican Vice President @RaquelPenaVice . Bridging the world, CEAir is on the way. https://t.co/iV1zyagBLY

data.text: We are so excited to witness that 1 million doses of China-made vaccines were delivered to Dominican Republican along with emergency medical supplies by CEAir's sub China Cargo Airlines. Wish people in this brave nation get better very soon. https://t.co/lOFrSPpN6N

data.text: In Ningbo, you will experience a long cultural tradition, and feel the power of science & tech. The rapid development of new materials, new energy, new information tech has brought convenience to people's lives and made the entire city more dynamic.#travelwithceair @TravelNingbo https://t.co/ixPejXBpGu

Diego is one of our Italian captains. After joining CEAir in 2018, he took his family to Wuhan. In his eyes, Wuhan is a charming city, with a convenient lifestyle, and the traditional cuisine is mouth-watering. Click the video to explore Wuhan with Diego.  #MUfriends #PalOnRoad https://t.co/TsNWUXwVBi

Ningbo, is a charming water city. If you want to get a glimpse into Ningbo’s glamorous water views, Yuehu Park is absolutely a must-go place.Tianyige, the oldest private library in China, is also located in here! #TravelwithCEAir 
@TravelNingbo https://t.co/tX4c6sW0fh
RT @skyteam: Your safety means everything to us. That’s why all 19 SkyTeam member airlines are committed to SkyCare&Protect, our alliance-w…

data.text: Ningbo’s glutinous rice ball is white and tender, chewy and tasty.Once taking a gentle bite, the nutty black sesame filling melts in your mouth with the sweet fragrance overflowing. Come to get a real taste of this popular dessert. #TravelwithCEAir @TravelNingbo https://t.co/7BYQ8YWldH

Good morning! A new week begins!
Together with our flight attendant Deng Yuxue , fly towards a better life! #ladypower https://t.co/t7ja03iDWl

data.text:
Do you know what day it is today?
Hint: π = 3.1415926...

Right! Today is #PiDay

Here is a special offer of delicious pie made by CEAir chef.

data.text: This is the 3rd year chef Ludwig Strobel joined CEAir. He loves to share his culinary skills with Chinese chefs and create innovative airline meals. The thing that makes him the happiest in his career is cooking the best in-flight meals for passengers. #MUfriends #PalOnRoad https://t.co/Ji4QM9mg8J

#TravelwithCEAir in this month will show you around a port city in SE China, full of delicious food, beautiful sceneries, and splendid history and culture. Any idea of which city it is? @TravelNingbo https://t.co/1ikeGM7Ps7
Have you ever seen the sea of clouds? If not, CEAir is very honored to take you to witness! https://t.co/RBuN7F88CD

Hi, VOA. The picture attached in your tweet is WRONG! Please correct the misleading message ASAP! 
你好，美国之音！配图存在误导，请立即修改！ https://t.co/esCrKLePNe
Who doesn’t love flying in the blue sky? Come and board our flight! #a350900 #airbus @Airbus https://t.co/2mbkp1qpFJ
